src: Urang ayeuna ngagaduhan beurit umur 4-bulan anu anjeunna ngagaduhan diabetes ayeuna atos henteu diabetes," Tambahan Anjeunna.
mt: "We now have a 4-month-old baby who has diabetes now and doesn't have diabetes," said the mother.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, profésor bidang kedokteran di Universitas Dalhousie di Halifax, Nova Scotia sareng ketua divisi klinis sareng ilmiah ti Asosiasi Diabétés Kanada ngingetkeun yén panalungtikan ieu karék permulaan hungkul.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, says this is just the beginning.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Sapertos sababaraha ahli anu sanés, anjeunna henteu percanteun upami diabétés tiasa disembuhkeun, kusabab pamanggihan ieu téh henteu aya hubunganana jeung jalma anu parantos gaduh diabétés tipe 1.
mt: As with many other experts, he does not believe that this discovery will lead to a cure for diabetes, as the finding is not related to people with type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Dinten Senén, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanén Komite Nobel pikeun Sastra di Akademi Swedia, umum diumumkeun salila hiji program radio dina Sveriges Radio di Swedia nu panitia, teu tiasa ngahontal langsung Bob Dylan ngeunaan unggul 2016 Nobel Prize dina karya Sastra, geus ditinggalkeun usaha anak pikeun ngahontal manéhna.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy for Literature, announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly, had left a message for him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius nyarios, "Ayeuna urang henteu ngalakukeun nanaon. Abdi parantos nelepon jeung ngirim surél ka kolaborator anu pangdeketna jeung anjeunna sareng waleranna téh soméah pisan. Kanggo ayeuna, éta cekap."
mt: "We are not making any statements at this time. We are contacting our closest collaborators and they are very shocked. For now, this is all we can say."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Sateuacanna, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, nyarios yén perusahaanna dimimitian nalika bel pantona téh teu tiasa kadangu ti tokona dina garasina.
mt: Previously, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, said his company was started when a doorbell he designed wouldn't work on the first try.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Anjeunna ngawangun bél panto anu nyambung ka WiFi, ceunah mah.
mt: They built a belt that connects to WiFi, but it's not working.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff ngomong penjualan meningkat sanggeus penampilanna di 2013 di episode Shark Tank di manten panel pintonan nampik ngadanaan startup.
mt: Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance on 2013's Shark Tank, where he was denied funding by the show's panel of investors.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Dina ahir 2017, Siminoff téh muncul dina saluran balanja tipi QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the home shopping network QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring ogé mereskeun gugatan hukum sareng perusahaan keamanan saingan, ADT Corporation.
mt: It also sued rival security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Sanaos aya hiji vaksin hasil ékspérimen anu mungkin bakal tiasa ngirangan jumlah korban jiwa akibat ebola, tapi dugi ka kiwari, teu acan aya landong anu jelas kabuktosan tiasa ngalandongan inféksina.
mt: While there is a vaccine in experimental trials that may reduce the number of deaths from Ebola, there is no clear evidence that it can prevent infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Hiji koktail antibodi, ZMapp, mimitina katingali ngajanjikeun di lapangan, nanging studi resmi nunjukkeun yén manpaatna langkung alit tibatan anu dipilarian, nyaéta nyegah pati.
mt: A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, was first seen in the field, but official studies showed that its benefit was less than expected, namely preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Dina tés PALM, ZMapp lalakon salaku kontrol, anu hartosna élmuwan nganggo éta salaku titik awal pikeun ngabandingkeun tilu parawatan sanés.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, with researchers using it as a baseline to compare three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Kelompok Senam USA ngadukung surat Komite Olimpiade Amérika Serikat sareng narima sagala kabutuhan keur kaluwargi Olimpiade supados tiasa ngapromosikeun lingkungan nu aman keur atlet urang sadaya.
mt: The USA Gymnastics group supported a letter from the United States Olympic Committee and accepted all the requirements for the Olympic family so that they can promote a safe environment for all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Urang satuju sareng pernyataan USOC téh kapentingan atlit sareng klub urang, sareng olahragana, tiasa langkung saé kalayan maju jeung parobahan anu berarti di organisasi urang, tibatan penghapusan sértipikasi.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that our athletes and clubs, and our sport, can benefit from moving forward and making meaningful changes in our organization, rather than superficially tinkering.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Organisasi Senam USA ngadukung panyilidikan mandiri anu tiasa nyorot soal panyalahgunaan proporsi anu digambarkeun ku wantunna ku para penyintas Larry Nassar nepi ka teu kanyahoan sakitu lami sareng mencakup parobahan anu sesuai sareng diperlukeun.
mt: The USA Gymnastics organization supports independent research that can track the extent of Nassar's abuse as long as it is not known for how long and includes changes that are needed.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Organisasi Senam Nasional AS sareng USOC gaduh tujuan anu sami - ngusahakeun olahraga senam, sareng sajabana, saaman mungkin pikeun atlit nuturkeun impianna di lingkungan anu aman, positip sareng diberdayakeun.
mt: The USOC and USA Gymnastics share the same goal - to promote gymnastics, and other sports, as well as possible for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and empowering environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Salami taun 1960an, Brzezinski damel kanggo John F. Kennedy salaku panaséhatna teras salajengna salaku pagawé administrasi kanggo Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later as a White House staffer for Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Dina pemilihan taun 1976 anjeunna jadi penasehat Carter dina urusan kabijakan luar negeri, teras salajengna ngawula salaku National Security Advisor (NSA) ti taun 1977 nepi ka taun 1981,  ngagantikeun Henry Kissinger.
mt: In 1976 he was appointed as a foreign policy advisor to Carter, later becoming National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Salaku NSA, anjeunna ngabantos Carter nguruskeun urusan hubungan diplomatis dunya, sapertos Camp David Accords, 1978; nganormalkeun hubungan AS-China dina akhir 1970an; Revolusi Iran, nu nyababkeun krisis penyanderaan Iran, 1979; sareng invasi Soviet di Afganistan, 1979.
mt: As NSA, he helped Carter manage world diplomacy, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US-China relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Film anu dibintangan ku Ryan Gosling jeung Emma Stone narima nominasi di babaraha kategori utama.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in several major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling sareng Stone masing-masing janten aktor sareng aktris terbaik.
mt: Gosling and Stone were each named best actor and actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Nominasi séjén kaasup Pilem Panghadéna, Sutradara, Sinématografi, Rarancang Kostum, Pangropéa Pilem, Penata Musik, Rarancang Produksi, Pangropéa Sora, Adumanis Sora sarta Skénario Asli.
mt: Other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Mixing, Sound Editing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: 2 lagu tina filem, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) jeung City of Stars, meunang nominasi keur lagu asli nu pang alusna. Lionsgate Studio meunang 26 nominasi -- langkung ti studio nu lian na.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate Studio won 26 nominations -- more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Dinten Minggon siang, Presiden Amérika Donald Trump dina kalimah pernyataan nu dikintunkeun ku sekretarisna, nyarios yén tentara Amérika bakal ninggalkeun Syria.
mt: On Monday, President of the United States Donald Trump said in a statement released by his secretary that American troops will leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Pengumuman éta dicarioskeun saatos Trump nelpon présidén Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement was made after Trump called Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turki ogé bakal ngurus pejuang ISIS anu ditangkep, saur pernyataan éta, nagara -nagara Éropa parantos nampik pikeun dibalikkeun.
mt: Turkey will also process ISIS fighters captured, as per the statement, European countries have refused to repatriate them.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Hal iyeu teu ngan mastikeun lamun aya sababaraha dinosaurus anu boga bulu, hiji teori anu geus nyebar, tapi teu tiasa nunjukeun detail fosil anu cukup, siga warna jeung susunan 3 dimensina.
mt: This does not prove that there were dinosaurs with feathers, a widely held theory, but it cannot show the details of the fossils, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Élmuwan nyatakeun yén bulu sato éta luhurna coklat kastanye nanging bagéan handapna pias atanapi karotenoid.
mt: Scientists say the feathers are actually a dark brown, but the lower part is orange or carotenoid.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Pendakan éta masihan wawasan dina parobahan bulu-bulu manuk.
mt: This discovery sheds light on the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Kusabab bulu dinosaurus henteu gaduh poros anu saé perkembanganana, anu disebut rachis, tapi gaduh ciri-ciri bulu sanesna - cucuk sareng barbules - panaliti nyimpulkeun yén rachis sigana mah hasil tina épolusi langkung ahir tibatan ciri-ciri nu lainna.
mt: Because dinosaur feathers lacked a well-developed rachis, a central shaft, but had other characteristics of feathers, such as barbs and barbules, researchers concluded that the rachis was a later evolutionary development than the other characteristics.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Struktur bulu na nunjukkeun yén éta henteu dianggo kanggo hiber tapi pikeun ngaturan suhu atanapi tampilan. Panalungtik ngusulkeun yén, sanaos ieu buntut dinosaurus anu ngora, conto ieu nunjukkeun bulu anu déwasa sanés bulu hayam.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for insulation but for temperature or display regulation. Researchers suggest, although this is a juvenile dinosaur, the example shows adult feathers are not bird feathers.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Para peneliti mikeun gambaran yen, sanaos ieu teh buntut dinosaurus anom, sampel nembongkeun bulu sawawa sarta sanes anak.
mt: The researchers say, although this is the tail of a dinosaur ankylosaur, the sample shows feathers and no offspring.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Hiji bom mobil diledakeun dina markas pulisi di Gaziantep, Turki kamari isuk, maehan 2 patugas pulisi sareng nyilakakeun langkung ti duapuluh jalmi nu sanes.
mt: A car bomb exploded outside a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey early on Saturday, killing two police officers and injuring more than 20 other people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Kantor gubernur nyatakeun salapan belas jalmi anu cidera téh nyaéta aparat pulisi.
mt: 17 people were injured, all of them police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polisi nyarios aranjeunna curiga ka tersangka militan Daesh (ISIL) anu bertanggung jawab dina serangan éta.
mt: Police say they suspect the militant Daesh (ISIL) group responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Aranjeuna manggihan lamun matahari beroperasi numutkeun prinsip anu sami sareng bentang anu sanes; Aktifitas kabeh bentang dina sistem kapendak didorong ku cahayana, rotasina sorangan, eta hungkul.
mt: It is found that the Sun operates according to the same principles as a spherical pendulum; all the Sun's activity is driven by its light, its rotation, and its heat.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Luminositas sareng rotasi dianggo pikeun nangtukeun nomor bintang Rossby , anu nyambung jeung aliran plasma.
mt: Luminosity and rotation are used to determine the Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Beuki leutik bilangan Rossby-na, beuki kurang aktif béntangna nu patali jeung pembalikan magnétna.
mt: With a low Rossby number, the star is less active and related to magnetic reversal.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Salila perjalanan na, Iwasaki ngalaman masalah dina seueur waktosna.
mt: During the flight, Iwasaki experienced problems at several times.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Anjeunna dirampok ku bajak laut, diserang ku anjing anu gélo di Tibet, kabur ti pernikahan di Nepal jeung ditangkep di India.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, ran away from a wedding in Nepal and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11 anu standar tiasa beroprasi dina frékuénsi 2.4 Ghz atawa 5.0 Ghz.
mt: 802.11 can operate at either 2.4 GHz or 5.0 GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Ieu bakal ngijinkeun éta ngabalik sareng bisa kangge 802.11a, 802.11b sareng 802.11g, upami stasiun utamana ngagaduhan dua radio.
mt: This will allow it to operate and coexist with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, if the primary station has two radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Kecepatan 802.11n jauh leuwih tereh tibatan pangheulana jeung hasil teoritis maksimum 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are much faster than its predecessors and theoretical maximum of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, anu tos nikah sareng gaduh dua murangkalih nu tos ageung, henteu ninggalkeun kesan anu saé ka Miller, anu patali sareng carita éta.
mt: Duvall, who was married and had two grown children, left no immediate relatives to Miller, who was involved in the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Waktos diménta koméntar, Miller nyarios "Mike seueur nyarios keur sidang lumangsung... Abdi nuju siap-siap janten abdi heunteu ngadangukeun naon anu anjeunna omongkeun."
mt: Asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike has said a lot in court... I'm not going to see what he's saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Kami bakal milarian cara ngirangan émisi karbon dioksida per unit GDP ku margin anu signifikan di 2020 ti tingkat 2005," saur Hu.
mt: We will reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin in 2020 from the 2005 level, "said Hu.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Anjeunna henteu netepkeun angka pikeun pemotongan éta, nyarios bahwa éta bade didamel dumasar tina hasil ekonomi Tiongkok.
mt: They did not give a figure for the cut, saying it was based on China's economic performance.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu ngadesek nagara-nagara berkembang "pikeun nyingkahan jalan pencemaran udara anu lami sareng ngabersihan engkéna."
mt: "It is time for developing countries to stop the long-term pollution and clean up now."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Anjeunna nambahan bahwasana "aranjeunna henteu kedah ditaros nyandak kawajiban saluareun tahap kamekaran, tanggung jawab sareng kamampuan aranjeunna."
mt: They added that "they should not be held responsible for the consequences of their growth, responsibility and ability."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Kelompok Diajar Iraq maparkeun laporana tabuh 12.00 GMT dinten ieu.
mt: The Iraqi Academy group announced their report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ieu ngingetkeun yén teu aya 1 pun anu tiasa ngajamin yén tindakan di Irak dina waktos ayeuna bakal ngeureunkeun perang sekte, ningkatna kakerasan, atanapi ngageser kana huru hara.
mt: This raises the question of whether current actions in Iraq will end sectarian war, increase violence, or move towards chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Laporan eta diawalan ku nyuhungkeun debat terbuka jeung formasi konsensus dina United States ngeunaan kebijakan keur Timur Tengah.
mt: This report was preceded by open debate and consensus formation in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Laporan éta kritis pisan ti hampir sadaya aspék ngeunaan kebijakan ti Eksekutif ka Irak jeung ngabutuhkeun perubahan arah anu geura.
mt: The report was highly critical of almost every aspect of the administration's policy toward Iraq and called for a change in direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Salah sahiji ti 78 rékoméndasina nyaéta inisiatip diplomatik kedah dilaksanakeun saméméh akhir taun kanggo ngamankeun perwatesan Iraq ti serangan musuh sareng mulai deui hubungan diplomatik sareng nagara tatangga.
mt: 78 of its recommendations include the diplomatic initiative should be implemented before the end of the year to protect Iraq from attacks by enemies and resume diplomatic relations with neighboring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Senator ayeuna sarta Ibu Nagara Argéntina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngumumkeun pencalonana minangka présidén kamari wengi di La Plata, hiji dayeuh 50 kilométer (31 mil) ti Buenos Aires.
mt: The current president and First Lady of Argentina, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for president late last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometres (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Ny. Kirchner ngumumkeun niatna pikeun nyalonkeun janten présidén di Téater Argéntina, lokasi anu sami pas anjeunna ngamimitian kampanye Sénat taun 2005 salaku anggota délégasi propinsi Buénos Airés.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location where she began her 2005 Senate campaign as a delegate from the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Debat éta dipicu ku kontrovérsi kusabab kaleuleuwihan dina pamakéan biaya keur bantosan jeung rékonstruksi saatos Badai Katrina; anu sababaraha jalmi konsérvatif fiskal téh nyebatkeunna "Kasepakatan Bush di New Orleans".
mt: The debate was sparked by controversy over the cost of the aid and reconstruction efforts following Hurricane Katrina; some fiscal conservatives have dubbed it the "Bush deal in New Orleans".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kritik liberal dina upaya rékonstruksi atos mokuskeun dina masihan kontrak rékonstruksi pikeun warga lokal Washington anu diaku.
mt: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focused on the lack of local Washington residents in the reconstruction contract.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Langkung ti 4 juta urang angkat ka Roma pikeun ngadatangan pamakaman
mt: 4 million people are expected to attend the funeral
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Jumlah jalmi nu dongkap seueur pisan matak teu sadayana tiasa lebet ka astana di St. Peter's Square.
mt: The number of people who can fit into St. Peter's Square is not known.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Sababaraha tipi ageung dipasang di sababaraha tempat di Roma supados warga tiasa nyaksian upacara éta.
mt: Several large screens were set up in various places in Rome so that citizens could watch the event.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Di seueur dayeuh sanes di Italia sarta di sakumna dunya, utamana di Polandia, pangaturan sarupa didamel, anu tos ditingali ku seueur jalmi.
mt: Similar regulations have been made in many other cities in Italy and around the world, especially in Poland, and have been closely watched by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Sejarawan ngritik kabijakan FBI anu kapengker anu mokuskeun dina kasus anu gampil dibéréskeun, khususna kasus maling mobil, anu dimaksudkeun keur ningkatkeun tingkat kasuksesan agensi.
mt: Historians criticize the FBI's policy of focusing on easy cases, especially car theft, which is intended to increase the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongres mimiti ngabiayaan inisiatif ngeunaan tindakan nu jorang dina fiskal 2005 sareng nyatakeun yén FBI kedah ngayogikeun 10 agén kana pornografi sawawa.
mt: Congress begins funding fiscal 2005 initiative and declares that the FBI must assign 10 agents to pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa ngadamel skor babak anu pangluhurna, 70 runs ku ngan 41 bal ku neunggeul 11 opat poin sareng 2 genep poin.
mt: Robin Uthappa made the highest score of the innings, 70 runs off 41 balls with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Panakol kriket pertengahan, Sachin Tendulkar sareng Rahul Dravid, nampilkeun permaenan anu sae sareng nyetak saratus angka ku duaan.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, put on a century stand with both scoring hundreds.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Tapi, saprak éléh kaptén wicket India ngan nyieun 36 lumpatan, éléh 7 wicket pikeun ngeureunkeun babak.
mt: But, since the Indian captain made 36 runs, the loss of 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Présidén Amérika Serikat George W. Bush sumping di Singapura subuh kaping 16 Nopémber, mimitian wisata saminggu anjeunna di Asia.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore early on November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Anjeuna di tampi ku Wakil Perdana Menteri Singapura Wong Kan Seng teras ngadiskusikeun isu perdagangan sareng térorisme babarengan Perdana Menteri Singapura Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and later discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Saatos saminggu éléh dina pertengahan pemilu, Bush ngomong ka panongton ngeunaan ékspansi dagang di Asia.
mt: After a week of setbacks in the mid-term elections, Bush spoke to business leaders about trade expansion in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper parantos satuju keur ngirimkeun 'Clean Air Act' na pamaréntah ka komite kabéh partai keur dipariksa, sateuacanna bacaan kadua, saatos 25 menit rapat dinten salasa jeung ketua NDP Jack Layton di PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper is expected to agree to send the "Clean Air Act" to all-party committee for review, after a second reading, following a 25-minute caucus meeting on Tuesday and NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton atos nyuhungkeun parobahan dina RUU lingkungan konsérvatif salami pasamoan kalawan PM, nyuhungkeun opiken "ditulis ulang sadayana teras lengkep" tina RUU lingkungan partai Konservatif.
mt: Layton called for a rewrite of the Conservative Party's "comprehensive" environmental bill after meeting with the Prime Minister.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Saprak Pamarentah Federal turun tangan kanggo nyokot alih ngadanaan Rumah Sakit Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, pamarentah nagara haturan sarta sababaraha anggota parlemen federal atos wagel tindakan ieu minangka aksi dina bubuka pemilu federal anu bade disauran dina sasih Nopember.
mt: Since the Federal Government stepped in to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and several federal parliamentarians have criticised this action as a pre-election stunt to be held in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Tapi Perdana Mentri John Howard nyarios  lamun tindakan éta téh ngan saukur keur ngalindungi pasilitas rumah sakit anu diturunkeun ku pamaréntah Tasmania, ku masihan tambahan 45 juta dollar Australia.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the action was only to protect a hospital facility built by the Tasmanian government, with an additional $45 million Australian dollars. ## English: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. ## English: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. ## English: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding. ## English: But Prime Minister John Howard said the action was only to protect a hospital facility built by the Tasmanian government, with an additional$45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Ceuk kalawarta anu paling anyar, pamacaan kadar cai laut ngabejaan aya tsunami. Aya sababaraha aktivitas tsunami leutik karekam di caket Pago Pago sareng Niue.
mt: According to the latest reports, the water level readings are indicating a tsunami.  There have been several small tsunami events recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Teu aya karuksakan atawa cilaka anu gede dilaporkeun di Tonga, tapi listrik sementara teu aya, nu dilaporkeun jadi sabab aparat Tonga teu tiasa narima peringatan tsunami anu diterbitkeun ku PTWC.
mt: There were no major injuries or damage reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily out, reported as the reason Tonga officials were unable to receive a tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Opat belas sakola di Hawaii anu aya di atanapi caket garis pantai ditutup dinten Rebo sanaos peringatanna tos dicabut.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii that are near or on the beach were closed on Thursday after the warning signs were removed.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Presiden Amerika Serikat George W. Bush ngabageakeun bewara éta.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush condemned the attack.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Juru bicara Bush Gordon Johndroe nyebut yen jangji Korea Utara "lengkah anu mantep pikeun tujuan denuklirisasi semenanjung Korea anu bisa diverifikasi."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the statement was "a positive step toward the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula that can be verified."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Badai ka sapuluh nu dinamian di usum Badai Atlantik, Badai Subtropis Jerry, kabentuk di Samudra Atlantik dinten ieu.
mt: 10 named storms in the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: National Hurricane Center (NHC) nyebatkeun yén ayeuna mah Jerry téh geus lain ancaman deui pikeun daratan.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) has downgraded Jerry to a non-threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Korps insinyur A.S ngira-ngira curah hujan 6 inci tiasa nembus tanggul anu samemehna geus ruksak.
mt: 6 inches of rain could overwhelm levees that have already been damaged.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Bangsal Kasalapan, anu ngalaman caah saluhur 20 suku salila Badai Katrina, ayeuna karendem cai saluhur cangkéng kusabab tanggul di deukeutna na ngaluap.
mt: The New Orleans levee, which suffered damage from Hurricane Katrina, is now leaking water up to chest-high because of erosion near it.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Cai ngaleber dina tanggul dina bagian anu lebarna 100 kaki.
mt: 100-foot wide sections of levee are overtopped.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Administrator Commons Adam Cuerden ngungkapkeun kakeselna kusabab omongan anjeunna ka Wikinews sasih kamari dihapus.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden revealed his account was blocked because of his comments to Wikinews last week.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: Anjeuna [Wales] dasarna ngabohong ka urang ti awal. Kahiji, ngalakonan lamun iyeu teh keur alesan hukum. Kadua, pura-pura ngadangukeun urang, nepikeun ka waktos ngahapus karyana."
mt: He [Wales] was always a liar from the start. First, he was doing it for legal reasons. Second, he pretended to be watching us, leading us to the time of deleting our work."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Kakeheulan masarakat nu nyababkeun kana usaha ngajukeun draf kebijakan ngeunaan eusi seksual keur situs nu nyediakeun jutaan media berlisensi terbuka.
mt: The public outcry led to efforts to draft a policy on sexual content for sites that provide millions of licensed open media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Padamelan nu rengse seuseueurna teori hungkul, tapi programna didamel pikeun simulasi panalitian anu dilakukeun ka galaksi Sagitarius.
mt: The project was originally intended to test theories about the galaxy Sagittarius, but the program was later used to simulate the experiment.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Éfék anu di téangan ku tim bakal disababkeun ku gaya pasang surut antara materi gelapna galaksi éta jeung materi gelapna Bima Sakti.
mt: The effect will be caused by the gravitational pull between the dark matter of that galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Siga bulan anu ngerahkeun gaya tarik ka bumi, nyebabkeun pasang surut, kitu oge Bima Sakti ngerahkeun gaya ka galaksi Sagitarius.
mt: The full moon's gravitational pull causes tides, and so does the Milky Way's gravitational pull on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Para élmuwan tiasa nyimpulkeun yén materi gelap méré pangaruh ka materi gelap nu lianna nganggo cara anu sami sapertos matéri biasa.
mt: Scientists may be able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Teori ieu nyebutkeun yén seueurna matéri poék disakitaran galaksi téh aya disakitaran hiji galaksi dina bentuk buletan cahaya, teras kadamel tina seueur partikel leutik.
mt: This theory suggests that the dark matter is around a galaxy in the form of a spherical ball of light, then made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Laporan tipi nunjukeun haseup bodas asalna tina pépélakan.
mt: A preliminary report said the fire was caused by fuel vapors.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Aparat satempat tos miwarang wargi nu linggih di sakitaran pabrik pikeun cicing di jero imah, mareman ac, sareng teu eeut ti cai keran.
mt: Authorities have asked residents living near the factory to stay indoors, close all windows, and turn off air conditioning and water faucets.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Numutkeun badan nuklir Jepang, cesium radioaktif sareng yodiumna parantos dipendakan dina pabrik.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected in a factory.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Pihak nu boga kawasa nganggap éta wadah anu keur nyimpen bahan bakar uranium di daérah éta tiasa waé geus retak jeung bocor.
mt: Authorities believe the container holding the uranium fuel in the area may already be cracked and leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dokter Tony Moll manggihan panyakit Tuberkolosis anu tahan pisan kana landong (XDR-TB) di propinsi Kwazulu-Natal, Afrika Kidul.
mt: Doctor Tony Moll discovered a strain of tuberculosis resistant to all known treatments in the province of Kwazulu-Natal, South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Dina hiji wawancara, anjeunna nyebatkeun bentuk nu énggal téh"pikasieuneun pisan sareng mangkhawatirkeun kusabab angka mematikan na ageung."
mt: In an interview, he described the form as "very scary and worrying because of the high death rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dr Moll nyangka sababaraha pasién panginten katularan panyakit éta teh di rumah sakit, sareng sahenteuna 2 nu katular téh nyaéta pagawé kaséhatan rumah sakit.
mt: Dr Moll believes that some of the patients are already in hospital, and certainly two of them are hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
